(Day 3)

Summer was last to leave the black box, second only to the scene study instructor who didn’t count. 

“Oh, wait!” Alexis said as Freddie also saw her. Adrian lurched himself forward for the button with the arrows that faced away from each other as Jamal stuck out his leg on the fly, and the door withdrew. 

“Oh,” said Summer, squeezing herself inside between Jamal and Jonah. “Thanks.”
